name: Climb Spidder Climb!
description:
*Controller needed, PS4 or Joycons recommended*

Made for a game a week class and the theme was weird inputs.  Control the spider named spidder and control each limb to hit the main points and advance your climb up the mountain. But be careful, if you let go of two limbs at the same time you lose. Also, I pray for your fingers with the control.

P.S. The first picture is the optimal way to use the controller to play
